name: DOUGLAS COUNTY SCHOOL DISTRICT, et al., petitioners, v. TAXPAYERS FOR PUBLIC EDUCATION, et al.
name_abbreviation: Douglas Cnty. Sch. Dist. v. Taxpayers for Pub. Educ.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
DOUGLAS COUNTY SCHOOL DISTRICT, et al., petitioners,
v.
TAXPAYERS FOR PUBLIC EDUCATION, et al.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Colorado. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the Supreme Court of Colorado for further consideration in light of Trinity Lutheran Church of Columbia, Inc. v. Comer, 582 U.S. ----, 137 S.Ct. 2012, --- L.Ed ---- (2017).
casebody.head_matter:
DOUGLAS COUNTY SCHOOL DISTRICT, et al., petitioners,
v.
TAXPAYERS FOR PUBLIC EDUCATION, et al.
No. 15-557.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 27, 2017.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Colorado. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the Supreme Court of Colorado for further consideration in light of Trinity Lutheran Church of Columbia, Inc. v. Comer, 582 U.S. ----, 137 S.Ct. 2012, --- L.Ed ---- (2017).
